input_text:
Job Title: Technical Lead

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Company:At CodeMonk, we’re venturing into new territories, shaping the future of diverse and decentralised teams. We know finding the right talents and teams is a major challenge in today’s skills market. That’s why we’re creating a gateway for companies to access the best global talents and teams that are agile and match their business needs.
Through this platform, employers can efficiently and compliantly hire, manage, and pay flexible tech talents and teams anywhere in the world. While reducing costs significantly.
As the world of tech work increasingly embraces a remote-first approach, we’re dedicated to redefining employer-employee working relationships. Our mission is to empower employees with better pay, the opportunity to build world-changing tech solutions, increased work flexibility, and a promising career path.
Website:http://www.codemonk.ai
Skills: Tableau, Power BI, Data Modelling, QlikView, SQL Server, Oracle, or MySQL, SSIS, Informatica, Talend, Python R Programming
Key Responsibilities:• Lead the design, development, and maintenance of BI solutions to support business decision-making processes.• Architect and implement data models, ETL processes, and data visualization dashboards.• Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand requirements and translate them into technical solutions.• Mentor and guide junior developers, providing technical expertise and support.• Conduct data analysis to identify trends, patterns, and insights for business optimization.• Optimize BI solutions for performance, scalability, and reliability.• Ensure data integrity, quality, and security across BI platforms.• Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in BI technologies.• Proficiency in BI tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or QlikView.• Strong SQL skills and experience with database systems like SQL Server, Oracle, or MySQL.• Knowledge of ETL tools like SSIS, Informatica, or Talend.• Experience with data modeling techniques and multidimensional databases.• Familiarity with programming languages like Python or R for data manipulation and analysis.• Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.• Ability to communicate effectively and collaborate with business stakeholders.• Professional experience in BI development or a related field.
Why we think you'll love working with us:We are early stage and already a profitable venture.You will be part of the journey we’re on, so we offer equity options for important roles along with competitive salary.It will be an exciting stage to join as we are looking to raise our first substantial round this year.Beyond this, there’s plenty more that makes us a great place to work:We are fully remote company with flexible workingWe do not follow 9-5 and work when we are at our best30 days Paid Time OffRegular remote socials with global teamsRegular bounties and other campaigns for you to winPlus more rewards as we grow

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Technical Lead
output_json.summary: Lead the design, development, and maintenance of BI solutions to support business decision-making processes.
job_responsibilities: Lead the design, development, and maintenance of BI solutions to support business decision-making processes.
Architect and implement data models, ETL processes, and data visualization dashboards.
Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
Mentor and guide junior developers, providing technical expertise and support.
Conduct data analysis to identify trends, patterns, and insights for business optimization.
Optimize BI solutions for performance, scalability, and reliability.
Ensure data integrity, quality, and security across BI platforms.
Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in BI technologies.
benefits: Exciting stage to join with potential for substantial funding round
Fully remote company with flexible working hours
Rewards and incentives as the company grows
output_json.company_information: CodeMonk is a platform enabling companies to access global tech talents and teams for efficient, compliant, and cost-effective hiring.
